decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Site Location Plan, Site Plan, A-01 dated 01.10.2021 (Existing Floor Plans Ground and First Floor), A-02 Rev 03 dated 16.07.2021 (Top of Roof Existing and Proposed Plans), A-04 dated 16.07.2021 (Loft and Loft Furniture Proposed Floor Plans), A04 dated 01.10.2021 (Side Elevation Existing), A-05 dated 01.10.2021 (Section A-A Existing), A-05 Rev 03 dated 16.07.2021 (Proposed and Existing Front Elevation), A-06 dated 01.10.2021 (Section B-B Existing), A-07 dated 01.10.2021 (Proposed Floor Plans), A-06 Rev 03 dated 16.07.2021 (Proposed and Existing Rear Elevation) and A-09 Rev 01 dated 16.07.2021 (Loft and Loft Furniture Proposed Floor Plans).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved rooflights to the roof slope of the development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The internal area created by the roof extension hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved side-facing window to the second-floor east elevation shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey side extension; rear roof extension
